response:
```python
def my_func(input1: str):
    score = 0
    rolls = list(input1)
    frame = 0
    index = 0

    while frame < 10 and index < len(rolls):
        if rolls[index] == 'X':  # Strike
            score += 10
            if index + 1 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[index + 1] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[index + 1] == '-' else int(rolls[index + 1])
            if index + 2 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[index + 2] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[index + 2] == '-' else int(rolls[index + 2])
            frame += 1
            index += 1
        elif rolls[index] == '/':  # Spare in the second roll
            score += 10 - int(rolls[index - 1])
            if index + 1 < len(rolls):
                score += 10 if rolls[index + 1] == 'X' else 0 if rolls[index + 1] == '-' else int(rolls[index + 1])
            frame += 1
            index += 1
        else:  # Normal roll
            score += 0 if rolls[index] == '-' else int(rolls[index])
            if index + 1 < len(rolls) and rolls[index + 1] == '/':
                pass  # Spare will be handled in the next iteration
            elif index + 1 < len(rolls):
                score += 0 if rolls[index + 1] == '-' else int(rolls[index + 1])
                index += 1
            frame += 1
            index += 1

    return score
```
